meta.title: Wartel Quran Academy
meta.description: Wartel Quran Academy offers online Quran memorization and teaching of Islamic sciences and etiquette (Fiqh, Aqeedah, Tafsir, Arabic grammar, and Seerah) for children and adults, men and women.

site_description: Online Quran memorization and teaching of Islamic sciences and etiquette (Fiqh - Aqeedah - Tafsir - Grammar - Seerah) for children and adults, men and women, using scientifically-based methods and a team of qualified teachers and instructors certified in the Quran and holding academic degrees from Al-Azhar University.

why_quran.title: Why We Memorize the Qur'an?
why_quran.hadith: It will be said to the companion of the Qur’an: Recite and rise in status, and recite as you used to in the world, for your status will be at the last verse you recite.
why_quran.teller: Narrated by Ahmad, al-Tirmidhi, and Abu Dawood

items.title: Flexible Schedules
items.description: You can study at any time that suits you and your children, either on mobile or computer.

items.title: Distinguished Teachers
items.description: Teachers from Egypt who are proficient in Arabic, graduates of Al-Azhar University, and Hafiz of the Qur'an.

items.title: Individual Lessons
items.description: The classes consist of individual lessons between the teacher and the student, allowing the student to focus and progress in memorization.

items.title: Track Your Progress
items.description: At the end of each month, you can track your and your children's progress and how much has been memorized, helping you measure development and progress.

items.title: Reading Instruction
items.description: Teaching reading to both children and adults in an easy and simple way using structured books suitable for everyone.

items.title: Hour Program
items.description: The academy offers a unique individual experience. Eight sessions per month, each lasting one hour. This intensive program is offered by professionals to ensure maximum benefit.

hadiths.hadith: It will be said to the companion of the Qur’an: Recite and ascend, and recite as you used to recite in the world, for your rank will be at the last verse you recite.
hadiths.teller: Reported by Ahmad, Al-Tirmidhi, and Abu Dawood

hadiths.hadith: Indeed, Allah has His own people among mankind. It was said: Who are they, O Messenger of Allah? He said: They are the people of the Qur’an, the people of Allah and His special ones.
The example of the one who recites the Qur’an and memorizes it is that of one with the noble, righteous scribes.
